backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, players, matches, contests, fantasy teams, points, and admin/user operations with access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for all frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and dark mode tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React entry configuring TanStack Router, auth state, profile setup modal, and theme provider.
frontend/src/components/AccessDenied.tsx: UI card displayed when a user without admin rights attempts to access restricted pages.
frontend/src/components/AdminScoringForm: Admin form for finishing matches and submitting player points with match and player selectors.
frontend/src/components/AdminSeedPanel.t: Provides admin forms to create matches, add players, and create contests using mutation hooks and simple input fields.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Defines the main app layout with header, navigation, auth controls, and routed content, adjusting shown items based on user auth and admin status.
frontend/src/components/AuthControls.tsx: Offers login/logout button logic tied to Internet Identity, clearing caches and showing toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/JoinContestDialo: Displays a dialog for selecting one of the user’s teams and joining a contest, handling loading, errors, and submission.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for creating a user profile with name and avatar selection, submitting data via mutation.
frontend/src/components/TeamBuilder.tsx: Implements player selection and role assignment for building an 11‑player fantasy team with captain/vice‑captain selection and validation.
frontend/src/components/UserBadge.tsx: Shows the logged‑in user's avatar and name by fetching their profile data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing identity state, login, logout, and AuthClient setup. Exposes a hook to access identity and login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, admin checks, matches, players, contests, and related data via the actor API. Integrates authentication state to enable or disable queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind CSS styles and CSS variables for themes, typography, and component styling. Includes light and dark mode color tokens and base element styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider. Loads global styles and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Renders the admin panel, showing seed and scoring tools only for authenticated admin users. Displays loading placeholders and access control as needed.
frontend/src/pages/ContestDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed contest information including leaderboard, status, and participant teams. Handles loading, missing contest states, and highlights the current user.
frontend/src/pages/ContestsPage.tsx: Shows all contests for a match with status indicators and join options. Handles loading, missing match states, and triggers join dialog actions.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with unauthenticated hero section or a match list for authenticated users, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/MatchDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed match info, fetches players for participating teams, and provides navigation to contests and team building.
frontend/src/pages/MyContestsPage.tsx: Shows the user's joined contests with loading, empty, and active states and links to contest leaderboards.
frontend/src/pages/MyTeamsPage.tsx: Lists the user's teams with captain/vice-captain info and player badges, handling loading and empty states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based query support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the frontend styling system.
project_state.json: JSON storing project metadata, feature list, image requirements, and current state for a fantasy sports app build plan.
